content.description: Finally put up the boulder under chastity belt. Start left hand on a crimp low on the arete and right hand on a low undercling. Continue up the arete all the way to the top then rock over.
Follow this short route up 3 bolts to the anchor.
content.location: This route will be the furthest route to the west in the cave on the right side wall.  It usually see's more light since it's near the west side exit

content.description: This route is 10 meters of fun pockets and crimps. The crux is at the start from 2 underclings, leading to hidden pockets up a little higher.
content.protection:
4 bolts and a 2 bolt anchor with chains for the lower off.

It's possible to clip the first bolt from a large boulder, prior to starting the route down a little lower.  Highly recommended due to a poor landing if you fell before making the clip.
content.location: This route is the first route on the left side wall as you enter the cave from the Main Wall.  It is hard to locate the bolts initially until your eyes adjust to the lower light levels of the cave.

content.description: Climb the same as send twig but when you get 3/4 of the way up traverse under the arete and finish on the back side of the boulder

Starts with an overhanging endurance section. Good rest next to the tree at the top of the south wall. Turn around and pull the technical crux to get onto the north wall. Then follow some nice handjams to the two bolt anchor.

Bring a stick clip for the first bolt, or just use an actual stick and some tape.

There's a fragile conglomerate rock bridge feature at the beginning of the route. Pull down, not out!
content.protection:
6x stainless steel 3/8" studs

2x stainless steel 3/8" studs for the anchor

All stainless hangars
content.location: The farthest west bolted route in the cave (starts on the south side of the cave, then switches to the north side of the cave)

content.description: Route R of porn star with a couple of different starts, R hand version being easiest way up the wall. Starting at porn star is harder, longer and more fun

Climb out the tufas on the Right wall of the cave (looking in from main wall), then thru the roof blocks to finish up Tigers Reach. WATCH FOR LOOSE BLOCKS and DONT STAND UNDERNEATH THE ROUTE.  I crowbarred as much as i could!!
content.protection: 3 fixe SS glueins and 1 SS fixe 3/8x3.5" before joining Tigers
